name: Michael Wheeler
title: CTO / Co-founder
bio: Mike has been programming since his dad bought him an Apple II when he was 12, and he is as passionate about the craft of programming as he is about building and supporting a quality business. He came to G2Crowd from TapJoy, where he helped to launch a mobile web product to an audience of more than 3 million users. Mike also spent four years on the BigMachines team, harnessing the latest web standards to design, build, and launch innovative web applications. When he isnâ€™t applying technological know-how to business problems, Mike can usually be found dancing lindy hop at one of Chicagoâ€™s many jazz clubs, or training at a Capoeira academy.

name: Mark Myers
title: Head of Product / Co-founder
bio: Mark started in desktop publishing as a young lad and has had a passion for design ever since. He has been working in multimedia design since 1994. Mark has a passion for user experience and loves to use his design training to delight software users. He has a surprisingly wide vocabulary, but prefers to communicate through simple â€œMarkismsâ€ including: â€œFactâ€, â€œAre you winningâ€ and â€œtrue storyâ€.  When not spending time with his family, he enjoys long walks, awkward dancing to Huey Lewis (and the news), improving his Usability skills, as well as scaling the always dangerous sar-chasm.

name: Hamed Asghari
title: Senior Software Engineer
bio: Hamed has been working as a back-end developer since 2011. His passions are writing optimized, modularized code and learning elegant design patterns. He spends most of his time working in Ruby, Javascript and Go. When heâ€™s not coding, Hamed can be found watching or playing soccer, organizing his tracksuit collection, and de-seeding pomegranates.

name: Craig Landry
title: Senior Software Engineer
bio: Craig has been a software developer for many years, enjoying a wide range of technologies and finding where each fits best.  He has a passion for building simple features for users, getting feedback, and constantly improving them.  When not building software, he can be found at local playgrounds with his daughter.

name: Kenny Browne
title: Software Engineer
bio: Kenny studied Computer Engineering at DeVry University, graduated with a 4.0, and started his career at BigMachines during his final semester. Kenny then went on to receive his Masters in Software Engineering from California State University-Fullerton. At BigMachines he spent 3.5 years working on complex technical problems with an end user focus. Kenny enjoys working with the latest technologies and even created a real time online task board using Node.js for his final Masters project. Kenny is G2 Crowdâ€™s foremost expert on all things Zombie since he has read over 300 zombie novels in the last couple years in addition to all of the other Sci-Fi/Fantasy books he has found. When not at G2 Crowd he enjoys reading, playing halo, and spending time with family.

name: Amanda Samy
title: UI Designer
bio: Amanda received her Bachelorâ€™s of Interior and Environmental Design degree from Illinois State University. She worked as a Design Engineer for 7 years, designing various consumer products before switching careers and pursuing a passion for digital design and user experience. In her free time, she can be found figure skating, cooking, or doting on her two dogs, Penny and Floyd. She also loves being outdoors and will be going on her 3rd backpacking trip this summer.

name: Molly O'Hare
title: Product Manager
bio: Molly turned a background in writing and editing into the foundation for a career in tech-focused marketing/communications. After earning a journalism degree and completing several newspaper internships, Molly pivoted and joined OneCommunity, a nonprofit focused on expanding high-speed broadband access and adoption in Northeast Ohio. Molly also spent time in the editorial department at Groupon before coming to G2 Crowd. Molly loves living in Chicago, but is a proud native of Cleveland. When sheâ€™s not watching the Browns, Indians, or Cavs lose, she enjoys brunch, bar trivia, and training for marathons.

name: Anna Muth
title: Product Manager
bio: Anna comes to G2 Crowd with a diverse background spanning the retail, technology and marketing industries from fledgling startups to Fortune 250 companies.  Annaâ€™s expertise in Analytics, Product Management and Usability is uniquely suited for the startup world.  Building on her undergraduate work in Mathematics and Linguistics at Dartmouth, she decided to blend her interests in technology and user experience to specialize in Human-Computer Interaction for her MSI at University of Michigan.  In her spare time, Anna enjoys a wide range of interests: cycling, hiking, organic gardening, and traveling internationally.

name: Michael Dorrance
title: Junior Software Engineer
bio: As a life-long builder, from Lego to custom homes, Mike transitioned his love of creating to web applications. He is passionate about building solutions that make the experience intuitive. When he is not learning new technologies, Mike is running with his family, camping or leading his local scout troop.

name: Ludwig Gerdes
title: Support Engineer
bio: Ludwig studied Business Administration and Marketing at Northern Illinois University prior to arriving at G2 Crowd. Ludwig brings a penchant for lifelong learning with him to the team, which is why he happens to have licenses in real estate and soccer coaching under his belt. Ludwigâ€™s free time is spent catching up on his favorite shows, reading soccer news, and exploring new vegetarian restaurants with his family.

name: Lorelei Pang
title: Junior Software Engineer
bio: Lorelei studied Computer Science at the University of Illinois in Urbana-Champaign, where her passion for dynamic problem-solving led her to seek a startup environment, and her love of awesome things led her to G2 Crowd. When not in front of a computer, she can be found playing card and board games, making music, or moving towards a computer to do those same things electronically.
